PRICE_VALIDATION_INFO:
For price fields;
1. 30.000 is 30 and not 30000
2. 10.239 is not 10239
3. Decimal part (.) can only come once in a number
4. 10.234.345 is an invalid entry

TOOLTIP.HFSS_FOOD_CATEGORY: This field is used to determine the 'Schedule 1' category of the product according to the HFSS regulations.
TOOLTIP.HFSS_FOOD_OR_DRINK: This field is used to determine whether the product is classified as Food or Drink according to the HFSS regulations.
TOOLTIP.HFSS_INDICATOR: This field is used to determine whether the product is in scope of HFSS regulations.
TOOLTIP.INCREASING_DECREASING_WEIGHT: Weight increments / decrements for adjusting product’s weight inside the cart.
TOOLTIP.MINIMUM_WEIGHT: Minimum weight of a product that can be bought by customer.
TOOLTIP.NUTRIENT_PROFILE_SCORE: This field is used to determine the score of a product according to the HFSS regulations.
TOOLTIP.PRODUCT_SUB_TYPE:
This field is used to differentiate product sub-types.
Pre-packaged - weight products that are sold on unit-basis
Fresh Meat & Cheese - meat & cheese products that are sold on a weight basis
Fresh Fruit & Vegetables - fruit & vegetable products that are sold on a weight basis
TOOLTIP.PRODUCT_TYPE:
This field is used to differentiate product types.
1.Piece - products that are managed on a unit basis.
2.Weight - products that are managed on a weight basis.
TOOLTIP.PRODUCT_UNIT: This field is used to manage product unit.
TOOLTIP.STARTING_WEIGHT: Weight of a product that will be added to customer’s cart by default on the mobile app.

PURCHASING_INFO.NET_NET_BUYING_PRICE_WITH_VAT: Net net buying price per [{{ weightUnitText }}] (with VAT)
